title: I think, I need someone to knock me down, put me in my place.
body:
Still waiting...

If ya'lls banter think you can really take me down go for it bro's. I got a '14 camaro waiting outside and I will drive it all the way to the nofucksgivenville if you even dare to knock me down cause I ain't about dat life. I ain't abuot dat life cause i'ma bout to steal ya'lls wives k?
